inn1.comm: bang on the good length on the middle stump and swinging away a touch. Butt shoulders arms to the delivery
good carry for Mortaza there as Butt is looking to sort out the pitch
outside the off stump, Butt comes forward and looks to drive but mistimes it to cover
outside the off stump, Butt gets onto the backfoot this time round and defends to cover
beaten! On the off stump and swinging away, Butt has a tentative prod at it but is lucky that he does not get any willow on that
on the off stump and a touch short in length, defends on the backfoot this time
outside the off stump and gets it to move away, Jamshed sways out of the line of the delivery
short outside the off stump, Jamshed forces it to cover point with supple hands
short outside the off stump, Jamshed looks to split the gap on the off side but is unable to
short on the off stump as Jamshed looks to open the face and run it away to third man but gets an outside edge which just eludes Shahriar Nafees at first slip to get a single
on the off stump, Butt gets onto the backfoot comfortably and defends it back onto the pitch
Reza drifts down the leg stump as Butt comfartably tucks it away to deep midwicket for a boundary
on the leg stump, Jamshed looks to turn it away to fine leg but gets a slight deviation off the thigh pad as they run across for a leg bye

dropped!, Mashrafe squares up Butt with a delivery that moves away a touch after pitching and also manages to get him to edge back to the keeper, who makes a mess of it. Dhiman Ghosh went for it with both the hands but was unable to grasp it
on the off stump, Butt comes onto the frontfoot and defends it
Mashrafe goes onto the leg stump this time round as Butt turns it away comfortably to fine leg to pick up three runs
fuller on the leg stump, Jamshed flicks it to the right of midwicket for a couple
drifts onto the leg stump, Jamshed glides it away to the fine leg boundary
outside the off stump, Butt comes forward and drives it to cover
outside the off stump and moving away a touch, Butt gets a stride across and lets it go to the keeper
on the off stump, Butt comes forward and drives to cover
outside the off stump, Butt lets the ball come onto the bat and places it in the gap between gully and point to pick up a couple
drifts onto the leg stump as Butt turns it away to fine leg for a single
classical! Reza offers width outside off as Jamshed leans into the drive as he sends it racing past the covers for a boundary. Straight out the manual, was that shot
outside the off stump and on a good length, Butt defends on the frontfoot
drifts far down the leg side as it is called a wide
on a good length on the off and middle, Butt gives it all the respect it deserves as he defends it off the backfoot
drifts onto the leg stump again as he turns it away to fine leg for a single
on the off stump, Jamshed stands tall and defends on the backfoot
good length delivery on the middle and off, pushing Jamshed onto the backfoot. Good clever bowling this by Mashrafe as he is not providing any width whatsoever
short on the off stump, Jamshed stands tall and lets go a double handed backhand, with top spin for a good effect. Not a good looking shot but an effective one, utilising shots from other sports
on the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
width outside the off stump, Butt leans into the drive but does not get it past the covers
on the off stump, Butt  moves across a touch and closes the face of the bat at the last moment as he gets it to midwicket
full and width offered outside the off stump, Butt drives it to covers
on a good length and moving away, left well alone by Butt
fuller outside the off stump as Butt jabs it to deep point to retain the strike
short on the middle and off, Butt nicely gets into the stride and pushes it to covers
drifts onto the leg stump, Butt being a wristy player flicks it away to deep midwicket to add three runs to the total
on the leg stump and getting to move across, but Jamshed has enough time to close the face of the bat on the backfoot as he pushes it to midwicket
on the off stump, Jamshed looks to drive it on the off side and plays his shot a touch too soon as he gets an inside edge to midwicket
on a good length outside the off stump, Jamshed defends it off the backfoot
on the leg stump, Jamshed shows the power of his wrists as he turns it to fine leg for a single
width offered outside the off stump, Jamshed bludgeons it away to the cover boundary with brute power to fetch himself a boundary

on the middle stump and a hint of an away movement as he squares up Jamshed with the delivery and manages to squeeze an outside edge off the bat as Dhiman Ghosh, safely pouches it. First blood then for the Bangla Tigers
fuller on the off stump, Younis in his trademark style comes onto the frontfoot and drives but straight to short cover
fuller outside the off stump again as Younis shovels it away to deep mid off to get runs against his name
fuller outside the off stump, Butt drives it to cover
on a good length outside off as Butt lets the ball come onto him and eases the ball to point
outside the off stump and moving away, Mashrafe has Younis groping for it
fuller on the off stump, Younis comes onto the frontfoot and drives it to mid off
on the middle stump, Younis defends on the backfoot
width outside off, Younis comes to the pitch of the delivery and drives it to covers
width outside the off stump, Younis leans into the drive but cant get the ball past the covers
on the off stump, Younis stands tall and presents the full face of the bat as it drops down onto the pitch
fuller outside the off stump, Butt gets the drive going but he too like Younis cant get it in the gaps
on a good length outside the off stump, Butt drives it to cover
a slower ball on the middle stump, as Butt checks his drive at the last moment
on the off stump, Butt pushes it to cover off the backfoot
on the off stump, Butt drives it to cover
full toss on the off stump, Butt drives it to mid off
fuller outside the off stump, Younis comes onto the frontfoot and drives it to cover
Mashrafe gets some lift from the pitch as Younis comes down the track, as he always does and feebly gets an outside edge to Dhiman Ghosh, who can pouch two in a row
on the off stump and coming in, Yousuf comfortably defends it on the back foot
fuller on the leg stump, Yosuf turns it away to midwicket for a single
moving away outside the off stump, Butt lets it go to the keeper
short outside the off stump, Butt takes two paces back and looks to force it away through the covers but gets a bottom edge onto the pitch
fuller outside the off stump, Yousuf defends on the frontfoot
width offered outside the off stump, Yousuf runs it away to third man to give the strike back to Butt
short outside the off stump, Butt moves onto the frontfoot and scissor drives it to cover
shot! width offered outside off. Butt moves across and cuts it away past covers for a boundary. He gets to split the gap on the off side with this shot
fuller outside the off stump, Butt drives it to cover on the run for a single
fuller outside the off stump, Yousuf drives it to cover off the frontfoot
drifts onto the pads as Butt looks to turn it away but gets rapped on the pads and a leg bye is awarded
outside the off stump and coming in a touch, Yousuf looks to run it away to third man but gets an inside edge and is lucky that it does not bring the stumps down
drifts onto the leg stump, Yousuf flicks it away on the leg side for three runs
outside the off stump and on a good length, Butt stands tall at the moment of impact with the ball and punches it through covers for a boundary. Good shot utilising the pace of the bowler there
on the middle and leg, pushes it to mid on
on the off stump, pushes it to cover off the frontfoot
on the good length outside the off stump, Yousuf steers it to third man to get himself off the strike
full outside the off stump, Butt leans into the drive as only a good fielding effort at cover does not allow the scoreboard to increase by four
Butt is rooted to the crease as Reza lets go off a shorter delivery
on the good length outside the off stump, Butt eases it to covers for a single
fuller on the off stump, Yousuf drives it to mid on

on the off stump and gets it to move away a touch as Yousuf gets into the drive mode and seems to have got a faint edge but Bucknor does not give it. Replays also seem inconclusive as Bucknor gives the benefit of doubt to the batsman and rightly so
starts off with a fuller delivery outside off as Butt drives it to short cover
on the middle stump, Butt flicks it with the spin to deep midwicket to pick up a single
on the leg and middle, Yousuf gets onto the backfoot to smother the spin
on the off stump, Yousuf runs it down to short third man
outside the off stump, Yousuf eases it to point off the frontfoot
on the leg stump, Yousuf uses his feet and flicks it away to deep midwicket for a couple
on the off stump and short in length, cut off the backfoot to point for a single
fuller on the off stump, holds back the pace a touch as Yousuf comes onto the frontfoot and drives it to mid off
drifts onto the leg stump as Yousuf tucks it away to fine leg with some deft placement to pick up a couple
on the middle and leg, Yousuf pushes it to mid on for a single
short on the leg stump, Butt pulls it away to deep midwicket for a boundary
fuller outside the off stump, Butt drives it to cover on the frontfoot
short outside the off stump, Yousuf rocks back and drives it to sweeper on the off side for a single
on the leg stump, Butt takes the frontfoot away and pushes it to deep midwicket for a single
on the middle and leg, would have been going down leg as the ball raps the pads
on the leg stump and going down again, Yousuf offers pads as his first line of defense
fuller on the middle stump, Yousuf works it away to midwicket for a single
on the leg stump, Butt turns it away on the leg side for a single

fuller outside the off stump, Butt looks to drive on the frontfoot and is deceived by the lack of pace on the ball as he is through the shot as it comes to him and the ball travels in air just falling short of extra cover
outside the off stump and on a good length, Butt defends on the frontfoot to cover

Reza has his man finally as he pitches one on the middle and off and gets it to move away a touch as Butt looks to run it away to third man but only succeeds in getting an outside edge to Dhiman Ghosh, the keeper. Nice bowling now by Reza
fuller outside the off stump, Malik looks to drive it on the off side but gets a leading edge back to the bowler
on a good length outside the off stump, Malik stands tall and pushes it to cover
on the middle stump, Malik pushes it to mid on to retain the strike
on the middle stump, Malik defends on the frontfoot
fuller on the middle stump, Malik drives it back to the bowler
outside the off stump, Malik leans into the drive as he gets a couple before the throw from sweeper can come in
on the good length outside off, Malik drives it to long off for a single
on the off stump, and short in length, Yousuf eases it past point for a single
on the off stump and fuller in length, Malik looks to drive it on the up but gets an outside edge to backward point
on the middle and leg, Yousuf closes his bat at the last moment to push it to mid on for a single
drifts onto the leg stump, as Malik  works it away to midwicket off the backfoot
fuller on the middle stump, Yousuf moves across and drives it back to the bowler
fuller on the off stump, Yousuf drives it to extra cover for a single
fuller on the off stump, Malik drives it to long off on the frontfoot for a single
fuller outside the off stump, Yousuf looks to squueze it away past point but cant quite do it.
width outside off, Malik makes room for himself and cuts it in the gap between point and gully for a boundary
outside the off stump, Malik comes down the track and offers pads as a line of defense
Razzak pushes a faster one in, Malik looks to cut it off the backfoot but is beaten by the pace on the delivery
on the off stump, Malik drives it to mid off for a single
outside the off stump, Yousuf looks to run it down but short third man intercepts it
outside the off stump, pushes it to cover
on the off stump, pushes it back to the bowler
on the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
on the leg stump as Malik forces it on the leg side through midwicket for a boundary
short outside the off stump, Malik makes room for himself and cuts it past backward point for a boundary
on the off stump, pushes it to mid on for a single
fuller on the off stump, drives it to cover
on the off stump, pushes it to midwicket
on the leg stump, Yousuf turns it away to square leg for a single
on the middle stump, Malik pushes it back to the bowler
drifting onto the leg stump again as Malik pushes the ball into the vacant spaces on the leg side for a single
on the middle stump, Yousuf is in position for the sweep shot as the ball is being bowled as he gets to sweep it to short fine leg for a single
short outside the off stump, Yousuf cuts it to point
short outside off again, this time round Yousuf slices it to cover for a single
on the leg stump, Malik works it away to deep midwicket to pick a couple for himself
on the off stump, Malik pushes it back to the bowler
on a good length outside the off stump, Malik eases the ball to point
on a good length outside the off stump, Malik moves across and steers it to short fine leg to retain the strike
fuller outside the off stump, Malik comes onto the frontfoot and defends
on a good length outside the off stump, Malik makes room for himself and cuts just out of the grasp of a leaping fielder at backward point for three runs. Lucky for Malik
on the off stump, Yousuf reverse sweeps to short third man for a single
on the middle stump, Malik moves across the sweeps it to short fine leg for a single
on the leg stump, Yousuf sweeps it away to fine leg for a single
on the off stump, Malik defends it off the backfoot
fuller outside the off stump, drives it to sweeper on the off side for a single
on the off stump, Malik defends it on the frontfoot
full toss outside the off stump, Malik comes down the track and forces it past covers with a powerful shot for a boundary
fuller on the off stump, Malik pushes it to long on for a single
outside the off stump, Yousuf steers it to third man for a single
fuller on the off stump, Malik drives it to mid off for a single
on a good length outside the off stump, Malik squeezes it to covers for a single
on the middle stump, Yousuf turns it away to midwicket
outside the off stump, Yousuf defends it down onto the pitch
on the middle and leg stump, Yousuf turns it away to fine leg for a single
outside the off stump, Malik moves across the stumps and then moves back as he confuses the bowler but he runs it away to third man pretty late to pick three runs
on the leg stump, defends on the frontfoot
outside the off stump, pushes it to deep backward point for a couple
fuller outside the off stump, Malik moves back a touch as he powerfully drives it through covers for a boundary. Not a fielder moved an inch as the ball wound it's way to the boundary
on the middle stump as Malik wristily pushes it back to the bowler
fuller outside the off stump, Malik drives it to long off for a single
on the off stump, Yousuf looks to drive it on the off side but gets a bottom edge back onto the pitch
short on the off stump, as Yousuf innovates and reverse sweeps it to third man region for a boundary. Yousuf is lending more than a supporting hand to his skipper
outside the off stump, Malik drives it to cover
fuller on the off stump, Malik squeezes it to point
short outside the off stump, Malik moves back and cuts it to sweeper on the off side for a single
on the middle stump and Yousuf covers the line and sweeps it to fine leg for a single
fuller on the off stump, Malik runs across after pushing the ball to long off and acknowledges the cheers of a roaring crowd for his half century
outside the off stump, defends on the front foot
outside the off stump, Malik  moves back and cuts it to sweeper on the off side for a couple
Malik comes down the track and takes it on the full as he drives to long off to get off the strike
short and wide outside the off stump as Yousuf comfortably gets into position to cut and does so with precision as he gets a boundary
ah! Is Yousuf a Euclid in disguise? He gets in line with a delivery on the middle stump and perfectly bisects the gap between fine leg and sweeper on the leg side as he sweeps it away
on the off stump, pushes it back to the bowler
on the leg stump, turns it away and gets a couple
on the off stump, defends on the front foot
outside the off stump, Malik comes down the track and looks to play a lofted drive as he gets an outside edge to short third man
on the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
on the leg stump, Yousuf sweeps it away to fine leg for a single
on the off stump and short in  length as Malik forces it past covers for a single
on the leg stump and Yousuf defends on the frontfoot
full toss on the leg stump, Malik turns it away to deep midwicket for a single
fuller on the leg stump, Yousuf gets down on one knee and sweeps it past short fine leg for a boundary
fuller on the off stump as Yousuf leans into the drive, which thuds onto the cover boundary
fuller on the leg stump, Yousuf plays it with soft hands to vacant spaces on the leg side for a single
fuller on the leg stump as Malik works it away to deep square leg to take a couple of runs
on the off stump, drives it to cover for a single
outside the off stump, Malik moves back and guides it to short third man for a single
on the leg stump and well flighted on the leg stump, as Yousuf brings up his fifty with a sweep
on the leg stump as Malik sweeps it to deep square leg for a couple
fuller outside the off stump, defends on the front foot
fuller on the leg stump as Malik comes down the track and lofts it to long on for a single to bring up the hundred partnership
fuller on the middle stump, as Yousuf who is looking to turn it away adjusts at the last moment to defend it on the backfoot
outside the off stump, Malik cuts it late looking to pierce the gap as he runs it down to short third man
on the off stump, drives it back to cover
on the off stump, Malik drives to cover yet again and gets a couple
outside the off stump and Malik defends on the front foot
arm ball from the middle stump, Malik looks to work it away to midwicket but gets an inside edge onto the pads
loops outside off as Yousuf drives it to cover
on the off stump and defends on the front foot
short outside the off stump, cut past point for a single
fuller on the leg stump, Malik flicks it a touch in the air as the midwicket fielder cant get to it
on the off stump, defends onto the frontfoot
outside the off stump, Yousuf sweeps it across the line to square leg for a boundary
short outside the off stump as Malik comes down the track and squeezes the ball to point but does not take a run
short on the middle stump, Malik moves back and cuts it past covers for a couple
fuller outside the off stump, Malik runs it down to third man but an overthrow from Mashrafe does not allow a run
on the off stump, Yousuf cuts it behind the point with rapier like precision for a boundary
on the off stump, Yousuf defends on the frontfoot
on the off stump, Yousuf moves across and sweeps it to fine leg for a boundary
short outside the off stump as Malik makes room for himself and cuts it past backward point for three runs
outside the off stump as Yousuf looks to run it away but gets a bottom edge
fuller outside the off stump, Yousuf drives it to covers but no run yet
fuller on the leg stump, Yousuf turns it away to fine leg for a single
on the leg stump, Malik gets to the pitch of the delivery and pushes it to deep midwicket for a couple
on the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
fuller on the leg stump as Yousuf pushes it to the right of long on for a couple
full on the middle stump, Yousuf pushes it to long on for a single
full toss on the leg stump as Malik pushes it to long on for a single
short outside off, cut to cover for a single
fuller on the middle stump as Malik moves across and smashes the ball over midwicket for a boundary
on the off stump, Malik lofts it over extra cover for a boundary
short outside the off stump, Yousuf cuts it to backward point really late to get a boundary
on the leg stump, Yousuf works it away to midwicket for a single
fuller on the leg stump, Malik pushes it to deep midwicket for a couple
gone! Malik moves across to fuller delivery outside the off stump and ends up lofting it down the throat of Shahriar Nafees positioned at long off.
outside the off stump, Misbah defends on the frontfoot
short outside the off stump, Misbah cuts it straight to point
on the leg stump, Yousuf pushes it to long off for a single
on the leg stump, pushes it back to the bowler
on the leg stump, Misbah turns it away to fine leg for a single
on the leg stump, Yousuf tries to paddle it but gets hit on the pad as he runs for a leg bye
on the off stump, Misbah reverse sweeps it to short third man for a single
on the leg stump, Yousuf pushes it to midwicket to pick an easy single
fuller on the off stump, Yousuf defends on the frontfoot
on the leg stump, Yousuf turns it away to midwicket for a couple
on the leg stump as he pushes it to mid on for a single
on the off stump, Yousuf runs it away on the off side for a couple
Yousuf moves back and pushes it in the gap at covers and calls for a couple as he plays the shot
fuller on the leg stump, Yousuf runs it away to midwicket for a single
short outside the off stump as Yousuf utilising the crease well punches it to long off on the backfoot for a single
fuller on the off stump, Misbah goes down on one knee and reverse sweeps it to backward point for a boundary
on the leg stump, Misbah turns it away to fine leg for a single
fuller on the middle stump, Yousuf pushes it to midwicket for a single
on the leg stump, Misbah tucks it away to fine leg for a couple
outside the off stump, Misbah reverse sweeps it to short third man for a single and retain the strike
on the leg stump, Misbah too now uses the crease effectively as he goes deep onto the backfoot and pushes it to midwicket for a single
fuller on the off stump, Yousuf drives it to long off for a single
short on the middle stump as Misbah pulls it away to long on for a single
on the off stump, Yousuf drives it to long off for a single
on the off stump again as Misbah drives it cover
on the leg stump, Misbah looks to run it away on the leg side but gets an outside edge to short third man for a single
wide down the leg side
fuller on the leg stump, Misbah moves back and powerfully bludgeons it over long on for a maximum
fuller on the middle stump, Misbah replicates the shot of the previous ball as he gets a little more distance on this shot
on the leg stump, Misbah turns it to midwicket for a single
fuller on the leg stump, this time Yousuf goes gun barrel down the ground for a boundary
on the leg stump, Yousuf pushes it to midwicket for a single
on the leg stump again as Misbah turns it away to fine leg for a couple
good length outside the off stump, Yousuf runs it away to third man for a single
outside the off stump, Misbah lets it go to the keeper
outside the off stump, Misbah runs it down to third man for a single
on a good length outside the off stump, Yousuf glides it to third man for a single
short outside the off stump as Misbah gets the ball under him and defends it back onto the pitch with soft hands for a single
outside the off stump and moving away a touch as Yosuf runs it down to third man for a single
short outside the off stump, Yousuf drives it to cover off the backfoot for a single
Misbah moves around the crease as he confuses Razzak, who fires it down the leg side and the keeper, Ghosh misses it as it runs away to the boundary
on a good length on the middle stump as Misbah using the crease well pushes it to deep midwicket for a couple
fuller on the leg stump as Misbah comes down the track and pushes it to deep midwicket for a couple
on the leg stump, Misbah comes down the track and defends
on the leg stump, Misbah turns it to midwicket for a single
outside the off stump, Yousuf pushes it to point to take an easy single
short outside the off stump, Yousuf cuts it to deep backward point for a single

fuller on the middle stump, Misbah pushes it to long on with soft hands and responds to Yousuf's call for a couple, who is quite lucky that Shakib slips on the surface or else he would have been in danger
on a good length outside the off stump and just moving away a touch, Misbah looks to have a push at it to covers but feathers it back to the keeper, who takes his fourth catch for the day
short on the middle stump, Afridi pulls and gets a top edge over the keepers head for a boundary
on the leg stump, turns it away to fine leg for a single
on the off stump, defends it on the frontfoot
short outside off, cut to backward point but no run taken
fuller on the leg stump, Yousuf works it away to fine leg for a couple
on the middle stump, Yousuf defends it on the frontfoot
on the leg stump, Yousuf rightfully gets to his fifteenth ODI hundred with a sweep shot, which he has played so well today
fuller on the off stump, Afridi comes down the track and smashes it past the bowler on the off side for a boundary
on a good length outside the off stump, Yousuf with a hundred behind him now unwinds as he forces it to backward point for a boundary
on the off stump and slower in pace as Yousuf picks it up as he runs it to third man for a single
on a good length on the off stump, Afridi gets under it as he gets the height but not the distances as it pitches just wide of a diving deep midwicket fielder
fuller outside the off stump, Afridi looks to cut but misses
fuller on the off stump, Afridi drives it past the bowler to long off. Mashrafe did well to weave out from the the ball
slower on the middle stump, Afridi pulls it to long on for a couple
fuller on the leg stump, Yousuf pushes it to long on for a couple
on the middle stump, Yousuf paddles it away to fine leg for a single
Afridi moves back before the ball is bowled and Razzak follows him as Afridi propels it to deep midwicket for a six
fuller outside the off stump, Afridi moves back and looks to go on the off side but misses and Dhiman Ghosh also misses a stumping chance
fuller on the leg stump, Afridi launches it over the bowlers head for another six to end the innings on a high

inn2.comm: outside the off stump as he pushes it to point
on the leg stump, Tamim looks to push it away on the leg side but gets a leading edge to cover
outside the off stump and short in length, Tamim guides it to third man for a single
short outside the off stump, Nafees leaps and looks to guide it over slips but it was a touch too high for that too
shot! short and wide outside off, Nafees moves across and brings the bat in time to cut it past point for a boundary
what a response! on the middle stump and swinging away a touch as Nafees is in two minds, whether to play it or not
fuller on the leg stump, Tamim turns it away but a misjudgement by Gul, who runs in towards the ball and finds the ball is too high for his leap and gifts a boundary to Tamim
gone! Tanvir puts in the effort ball as he moves it in and Tamim  has a wild swing at it but is beaten all ends up and is castled.
outside the off stump and swinging away, Aftab lets it go to the keeper
outside the off stump and swinging away, left alone by Aftab again
swinging away from middle and off, Aftab has a defensive prod at it and is beaten by the swing
outside the off stump and swinging away, Aftab has a wild swing at it and misses
on the leg stump, Nafees pushes it to midwicket on the backfoot
outside the off stump and swinging away, Akmal and Gul appeal for an outside edge but it is an anti climax as Bucknor calls it a wide
short on the middle stump, Nafees moves onto the backfoot and gets a bottom edge onto the pull shot
on a good length outside the off stump, Nafees runs it down to third man for a single
Gul oversteps as he bowls a ball just outside the off stump and Aftab lets it go to the keeper
wide down the leg side, Akmal just about manges to gather it
just short of a good length on the middle stump, Aftab looks to pull it but misses it by a margin
on the leg stump, Aftab pushes it to midwicket for a single
Gul drifts onto the leg stump as Nafees turns it away to fine leg for a single
fuller on the off stump and moving away a touch as Nafees gets his bat down in time to defend on the front foot
on the leg stump, Nafees turns it away to fine leg for a single
outside the off stump, pushes it to point
outside the off stump, pushes it to deep point for a couple
outside the off stump and swinging away, Aftab drives at it and misses
outside the off stump and swinging away, Aftab lets it go to the keeper
outside the off stump, Nafees pushes it to point for a single
on the off and swinging in, Aftab gets onto the backfoot and defends
on the off stump, Aftab gets on to front foot and defends
short on the leg stump, Aftab looks to pull it away but pulls out of it at the last moment
outside the off stump and swinging away, Aftab shoulders arms to the delivery
short outside the off stump as Aftab cuts it but gets a bottom edge to slip
short ball outside the off stump, Nafees looks to cut it and misses
wide down the leg side
fuller on the off stump, looks to drive it but gets a leading edge to fine leg for a couple
short on the middle stump, Nafees pulls but gets a top edge to fine leg for a boundary
on the off stump, Nafees defends on the front foot
fuller on the leg stump, Nafees turns it away to fine leg for a couple
fuller on the off stump and moving away a touch, Nafees looks to turn it away on the leg side but is rapped on the pads
on the off stump, Aftab pushes it to covers and gets a single
on the leg stump, Nafees turns it away to fine leg for a couple
on a good length on the middle stump as Nafees defends on the front foot
on a good length on the off stump and moving away a touch, Nafees looks to defend it but is beaten by the late swing
on a good length outside the off stump, Nafees cuts it to third man for a single
fuller on the leg stump, Aftab flicks it away past midwicket for a delectable boundary. When on song, he is one of the most destructive batsmen
fuller on the leg stump, it is Nafees' turn to turn it away to fine leg for a single
bang on the money on the middle stump, Aftab is alert to the moment as he cautiously defends it on the frontfoot
short on the off stump, Aftab moves away and looks to cut it but is beaten by the ball coming in
on a good length on the middle stump, Aftab gets deep back into his crease and pushes it to covers
on the off stump, Aftab pushes it to mid off for a single

outside the off stump and swinging away, Nafees looks to cut it but gets an outside edge back to the keeper. Dar takes his time in giving his decision but what was Nafees doing chasing that wide delivery?
outside the off stump, Aftab runs it to short third man for a single
outside the off stump and moving in a touch as Ashraful plays with soft hands on the leg side for a single
on the off stump and coming in a touch, Aftab defends it to cover on the backfoot
outside the off stump and coming in, Aftab again makes judicious use of the crease as he defends on the back foot
on the off stump and moving in, Aftab plays with soft hands to midwicket for a single
on a good length outside the off stump, Ashraful gets to the line of the delivery and lets it go to the keeper
swinging away from the off stump, Aftab has a wild swoosh at it but is beaten
outside the off stump and on a good length, Aftab cuts it to point
on the leg stump and swinging in, Aftab looks to turn it away on the leg side but gets an inside edge onto his pads and runs across for a single
on the middle stump and swinging away, nearly squares up Ashraful, who defends on the backfoot
on the leg stump, Ashraful pushes it to midwicket
outside the off stump and swinging away, left alone by Ashraful
on the leg stump, defends on the frontfoot
on the leg stump, Ashraful comes forward and defends it
on a good length on the middle stump, Ashraful closes the face of the bat and pushes it to midwicket for a single
on a good length on the off stump, Aftab gets back into the crease and turns it away to fine leg for three runs
outside the off stump and Ashraful watches it into the keeper's gloves
on the off stump and swinging away, left alone by Aftab
outside the off stump, Aftab shoulders arms to this delivery

on the off stump, Aftab comes down the track and looks to loft it away on the off side but gets an outside edge back to the keeper, Akmal who pouches it. What got into Aftab's mind as he was batting pretty well but he throws it all away
wide down the leg side
outside the off stump and left alone by Raqibul
outside the off stump and coming back in, Raqibul tries to defend it but is beaten
fuller on the leg stump, Raqibul flicks it away to deep midwicket for three runs to get off the blocks
outside the off stump and  moving away a touch as Raqibul is beaten by the away swing
outside the off stump and swinging away a touch as Raqibul shoulders arms
outside the off stump and Raqibul defends on the frontfoot
on a good length outside off, Raqibul pushes it to covers
outside the off stump and swinging away again as Raqibul leaves it alone
on the off stump, Raqibul defends it on the frontfoot
wide outside the off stump
outside the off stump and coming in a touch, left alone by Ashraful
on the leg stump, Ashraful flicks it away to fine leg for a couple
outside the off stump and keeping its line as Ashraful lets it go to the keeper
on the off stump and no shot offered by Ashraful again
outside the off stump as Ashraful shoulders arms to this delivery
drifts down the leg stump and called a wide
outside the off stump and left alone again by Ashraful
short on the off stump as Raqibul ducks under it comfortably and thats one for the over
outside the off stump and swinging away, Raqibul plays and misses
outside the off stump and coming in, played off the backfoot by Raqibul
on the middle stump and swinging in, Raqibul looks to turn it away but is beaten by the inward swing
outside the off stump, Raqibul runs it down to third man for a couple
on the middle stump, Raqibul defends on the front foot
Afridi oversteps and bowls it outside the off stump and Ashraful looks to cut it away but gets a bottom edge to short third man
on the off stump, Ashraful gets across as he gets one hand onto face of the bat and reverse sweeps it away to third man for a boundary
on the front foot and drives to cover for a single
on the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
outside the off stump, Raqibul gets across and defends it
beaten outside off
on the leg stump and defends it on the frontfoot

on the off stump and slower in pace, Ashraful looks to pull it away on the leg side or rather more a swish and misses it and turns back to see the wood work rearranged. This is talent throwing it away, how many times did we say this about Ashraful and he needs to be accountable for all his silly shots
wide outside the off stump
slower delivery outside the off stump and moving away a touch, Shakib looks to cut and gets a faint edge back to the keeper and walks. He makes it an easier job for Bucknor
on the off stump and coming in, Mahmudullah defends on the frontfoot
short on the middle stump, Mahmudullah ducks under it
good length on the middle stump, Mahmudullah gets behind the line of the delivery and flicks it away to midwicket for a single
on the middle stump, Raqibul comes onto the frontfoot and defends it
on the good length outside off, Mahmudullah pushes it to point
on the off stump, Mahmudullah turns it away to fine leg for a single
on the middle stump and sharp turn, Raqibul beaten by turn gets a bat somehow onto it
outside the off stump, Raqibul pushes it to cover and calls but Yousuf gathers the ball and throws it back to Afridi who whips off the bails. Poor running by the batsmen? What else have we got to see
outside the off stump and swinging away left alone
short on the middle stump to greet him
short down the leg side and Akmal also misses it as it runs down to fine leg
on a good length outside the off stump, defended on the backfoot to point
Ifthikar goes down the leg side but wide is not given
outside the off stump and swinging away, Reza runs it down to third man for a single
onto the leg stump as Raqibul is rapped on the pads and runs across for a leg bye
slower outside off, as he defends it on the frontfoot
outside the off stump, guides it to point
on the off stump, Raqibul defends it on the frontfoot
on the off stump, Raqibul drives it to mid off for a single
outside the off stump, Reza defends it on the frontfoot
on the off stump, Reza gets his bat down in time to defend it
on the off stump, Raqibul closes the face of the bat as he turns it to midwicket
on the off stump as Raqibul turns it away to midwicket yet again
on a good length outside the off stump, Raqibul drives it to short cover
fuller outside the off stump, Raqibul squeezes it to point off the backfoot
Ifthikar goes hunting down the leg side and is punished with a wide
outside the off stump and coming in, Raqibul gets onto the backfoot and defends
fuller outside off, Raqibul drives it to cover
on the leg stump, Reza pushes it to the leg side for a single
fuller on the leg stump as Raqibul comes down the track and lofts it to long on for a boundary
on the leg stump, defends on the frontfoot
on the off stump, pushes it to cover for a single
fuller on the off stump, Afridi gets a taste of his own medicine as Reza comes down the track and lofts it to mid off for a boundary
on the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
wide down the leg side to start off with
on the leg stump, pushes to short midwicket
on the leg stump, pushes it to midwicket
on the middle stump, defends on the frontfoot
on the middle stump as he comes onto the frontfoot and defends
wide down the leg side
short outside off as he cuts it to third man for a single
wide outside off
Afridi bowls a flipper on the middle stump and Reza is shocked by the pace and thrusts his pads forward as he is hit flush on them and is plumb in front
Ghosh gets a ball on the off stump and turning away and gets an outside edge which grazes Akmal's gloves and Younis does well to take the catch at first slip off the deflection
faster one on the off stump as Mashrafe defends it
well flighted delivery on the off stump as Mashrafe drives it silly point where Malik is hit
googly on the off stump, And he is struck high on the pads
beaten by the turn outside off
on the leg stump, flicks it away to square leg

on the off stump and Raqibul, who has been scrapping around for a while gets an inside edge onto his pads and the ball bobs up from the pads as Akmal comes diving forward and takes a one handed catch. Quite an acrobatic effort that by Akmal and it is refreshing to watch
outside the off stump and left alone
outside the off stump and left alone again
outside the off stump, drives it to cover
outside the off stump and left alone by Razzak
on the off stump and turning away, beaten by the turn is Mashrafe
full on the off stump, drives it to deep extra cover for a boundary
short outside the off stump as Mashrafe cuts it away to deep point for a boundary
on the off stump, Mashrafe turns it to midwicket and sets off
googly on the off stump as Razzak is beaten and struck on the thigh pad
well flighted delivery on the leg stump as Razzak looks to flick it away but is beaten
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
fuller outside off, Mashrafe smashes it to long off for a single
beaten outside the off stump is Razzak
on the leg stump, Razzak turns it away to square leg for a single
on the leg stump, Mashrafe hoicks it to deep midwicket for a couple
on the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
outside the off stump and is beaten
on the off stump, as he drives it to extra cover for a couple
on the leg stump, turns it away to fine leg for a single
on the off stump, Mashrafe drives it to cover for a single
on the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
on the off stump, drives to mid off for a single
on the off stump defends on the frontfoot
on the leg stump, turns it away to fine leg for a single
fuller on the leg stump, Mashrafe drives it to long on for a boundary
on the middle stump and turning in,  rapped on the pads
on the leg stump and rapped on the pads again
short on the leg stump, Mashrafe pulls it over deep midwicket for a huge six
full on the leg stump as Razzak lofts it to long on for a boundary
wide down the leg side
dropped! short outside off, Mashrafe gets a thick outside edge to first slip as Younis fails to hold onto it and deflects it to short fine leg for a couple
outside the off stump and defends on the frontfoot
on the off stump and fuller in length, Mashrafe comes down the track and lofts it straight down the throat of Sohail Tanvir at long off to hand over the match to Pakistan
